gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 118, Pistons 104
gameRecap.excerpt: Kyle Kuzma tallied his seventh 30-point game of the year with 30 points, six rebounds, and four assists as the Wizards defeated the Pistons, 118-104. Jordan Poole added 17 points as Daniel Gafford totaled 15 points, 13 rebounds, and three steals for Washington. Bojan Bogdanovic led Detroit with 30 points while Cade Cunningham scored 20 points with 12 assists. The Wizards improve to 8-37 as the Pistons move to 5-40.
